solution_line_template: The number of visitors that are residents of NYC is {total_visitors} / {nyc_resident_fraction_divisor} = <<{total_visitors}/{nyc_resident_fraction_divisor}={nyc_residents}>>{nyc_residents} visitors

The number of NYC resident visitors that are college students is {nyc_residents} * {college_student_percent} = <<{nyc_residents}*{college_student_percent}={college_students_nyc_residents}>>{college_students_nyc_residents} visitors

The money from the college students that are residents of NYC is {college_students_nyc_residents} * ${ticket_cost_college_student} = $<<{college_students_nyc_residents}*{ticket_cost_college_student}={money_from_college_students}>>{money_from_college_students}
